item.description:
Enjoy meeting fruity raw vegans and like-minded or curious people with fruit snacks provided and maybe raw vegan prepared food samples or bring fresh organic fruit or low fat raw vegan food for yourself or to share. You can find simple low fat (high carb) raw vegan recipe ideas at auraw.com in recipes and essenic.com in blog.

Call* to RSVP and for Location/Time (subject to change) and more information for this month (ie: possible food-prep-demo, DVD, activity, topic of discussion, recipe, etc.) or to make suggestion or request. The location may be unfinished (a bit under construction or repair), so please be patient and call with any questions or concerns. Thank you. Enjoy life! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Call* to RSVP & for location/time (subject to change) & more info.
item.name: Fruity Raw Vegan Party
